description:
Alright, that's a mouthful. Let's break it down.

We will be looking at cellular automata. A cellular automata is a set of units governed with very simple rules. These units make up a complex system, or a model.

We can train cellular automata to genetically evolve, making themselves better overtime. We can make them adhere to a set of rules that would make the system reach a certain outcome at the end of N generations. We can even use these concepts in the wild.

We will be doing it all with JavaScript.
title: Irina Shestak - TAKING ON GENETICALLY EVOLVING CELLULAR AUTOMATA WITH JAVASCRIPT
